name: Parasympathetic Nervous System

claims.object: Affiliated with the “rest and digest response”

surface_layer.definition: A division of the autonomic nervous system responsible for the 'rest and digest' functions.

deep_layer.mechanism: Conserves energy by slowing the heart rate and promoting digestion.
deep_layer.origin: Evolved as a mechanism for energy conservation.

instance_layer: Slowing of heart rate during sleep
Increased digestive activity after a meal

epistemic_metadata.source: US7616990B2 - Implantable and rechargeable neural stimulator - https://patents.google.com/patent/US7616990B2/en
